attributes.action: increase the age that one can gain a driving license
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not believe that a 17 year old has the maturity to handle the responsibilty that car ownership brings, and urge you to consider increasing the age to 20 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
